biBraqdAga#hi || 
viki#ridaq vilO#hitaq nama#stE astu BagavaH | 
yAstE# saqhasra(gm)# hEqtayOq&nya-maqsmanni va#pantuq tAH || 				
saqhasrA#Ni sahasraqdhA bA#huqvOstava# hEqtaya#H | 
tAsAqmISA#nO BagavaH parAqcInAq muKA# kRudhi || 25 
(aqsmi(gg)-staqnuva#H-stuqhi-pinA#kaq-mEkAqnnatriq(gm)qSacca#) (A10)
